insSteps: Wash and peel the potatoes. (You can replace those with sweet potatoes or any kind of squash).
Slice them into 3 mm pieces, and add them to a big pot.
Add the cream, milk, garlic, chili flakes, salt and pepper.
Heat over medium heat until it just begins to boil.  Stir gently with a wooden spoon, and cook for 15 more minutes.
Preheat your oven to 200 °C using the fan setting.
Butter a gratin dish, and arrange the sweet potato slices in layers.
Pour the creamy mixture over the sweet potato.
Bake for 30 minutes. Let it rest for 10 minutes before serving.
